attributes.action: Theresa May must resign with immediate effect by request of the British people.
attributes.additional_details:
The British people insist that she and parliament allow a Prime Minister who is in favor of a No Deal Brexit to take over in the handling of a No Deal Brexit that the British people voted for by majority.
 
As there was no deal mentioned for leaving the EU during the referendum this vote must be honored in the interest of democracy.

Also the ministers in the house of commons are to start negotiating deals through the World Trade Order with immediate effect as was expected.
attributes.background: In the interest of the Brexit vote that the people of the United Kingdom and British Isles were told and believed they were voting for, the people of the United kingdom and Great Britain insist that Theresa May must now resign with immediate effect.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister.
